name: NeimiColmTalk
_source: speak;Colm;Neimi?!{br}What are you doing here?|I told you to wait for me, didn't I?
speak;Neimi;I couldn't...|It's too dangerous.|Cmon, let's go home.
speak;Colm;We don't have a home!|Don't you get it?|Look, just leave everything to me.|I can take care of it in a flash, but I don't need a clumsy oaf like you tagging along.
speak;Colm;Oh, this is ridiculous.|We'll talk later.|Don't leave my side, Neimi.
